user_query: I'm planning a family trip to Europe and want to explore the world of cryptocurrencies. Can you provide me with the latest news articles on cryptocurrency to stay updated? Additionally, fetch me the impressive numbers related to the DeFi ecosystem, such as the number of oracles, blockchains, and exchanges, to share with my family.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest news articles related to cryptocurrencies.
Retrieve statistics related to the DeFi ecosystem, including the number of oracles, blockchains, and exchanges.
